Institute_Summary: Welcome to the world of Correspondence Education. Distance Education is one of the most suitable means of continuing education while working. Distance education makes you complete your education along with your job experience. Correspondence Education Courses gets the same value, status and the recognition as a regular college degree. All our courses are UGC recognized and can be produced for Government and MNC jobs, educational loan for further studies. The tremendous change at which science and technology is progressing makes it essential for people to develop their knowledge and skills in order to keep updated in their fields of work. The importance of distance education is a source of opportunities for people who aspire to learn more but do not have the convenience for it. In distance learning or distance education, the teacher and learner are separated geographically and by time. System of correspondence course has developed into distance education, with the acquisition of additional features. On the other hand, open learning refers to an arrangement in which learners adopt the style of self-instruction, completing courses structured around specially prepared learning materials, supported by contact classes and examinations. Open learning implies a philosophy of open entry and access to learning opportunities but it does not necessarily incorporate technological advances. Distance learning makes use of new technological devices. There may be slightly varying views on these definitions. Open universities have made remarkable progress in recent years thanks to the great demand for facilities different from those offered by conventional colleges.
